post.title: Comments in PHP
post.description: A comment in PHP code is a line that is not executed as a part of the program. Its only purpose is to be read by someone who is looking at the code.
post.content:
Comments can be used to:

  1. Let others understand your code
  2. Remind yourself of what you did - Most programmers have experienced coming back to their own work a year or two later and having to re-figure out what they did. Comments can remind you of what you were thinking when you wrote the code PHP supports several ways of commenting:
Single-line and Multi-line
// comment
# also comment
/* multi-line comment */
